{{year-header}}

==January==
* '''?''' - [[Minas Tirith Evening-Star (Volume 8, Number 2)|''Minas Tirith Evening-Star'' (Volume 8, Number 2)]] is published.

==February==
* '''[[17 February|17]]''' - American composer [[Bear McCreary]] is born.

==March==
* '''[[25 March|25]]''' - Actor [[Lee Pace]] is born.
* '''[[31 March|31]]''' - ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: Scholar and Storyteller]]'' is published.
==April==
* '''[[15 April|15]]''' - Actor [[Luke Evans]] is born.
* '''[[28 April|28]]''' - ''[[One Ring to Bind Them All: Tolkien's Mythology]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings Fotonovel]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - [[Amon Hen 38|''Amon Hen'' 38]] is published.

==June==
* '''?''' - ''[[Warren Special Edition: The Lord of the Rings]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - [[Amon Hen 39|''Amon Hen'' 39]] is published.
==July==
* '''[[12 July|12]]-[[15 July|15]]''' - [[Mythcon 10]].
* '''[[25 July|25]]''' - American writer and producer [[Bryan Cogman]] is born.

==August==
* '''[[3 August|3]]''' - Actress [[Evangeline Lilly]] is born.
* '''?''' - [[Amon Hen 40|''Amon Hen'' 40]] is published3
==September==
* '''[[28 September|28]]-[[30 September|30]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 1979]].
* '''[[29 September|29]]''' - Scholars [[Humphrey Carpenter]], [[George Sayer]] and [[Clyde S. Kilby]] deliver a public discussion on [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] at Wheaton College, Illinois (published as "[[A Dialogue: Discussion by Humphrey Carpenter, Professor George Sayer and Dr. Clyde S. Kilby]]").
* '''?''' - ''[[The Individuated Hobbit]]'' is published.

==October==
* '''[[1 October|1]]''' - The ''[[Jackanory]]'' episode "An Unexpected Party" is aired on the [[BBC]].
* '''[[2 October|2]]''' - The ''[[Jackanory]]'' episode "Over Hill and Under Hill" is aired on the [[BBC]].
* '''[[3 October|3]]''' - The ''[[Jackanory]]'' episode "Riddles in the Dark" is aired on the [[BBC]]. 
* '''[[4 October|4]]''' - The ''[[Jackanory]]'' episode "Out of the Frying-Pan and Into the Fire" is aired on the [[BBC]].
* '''[[5 October|5]]''' - The ''[[Jackanory]]'' episode "Flies and Spiders" is aired on the [[BBC]].
* '''[[8 October|8]]''' - The ''[[Jackanory]]'' episode "Barrels Out of Bond" is aired on the [[BBC]].
* '''[[9 October|9]]''' - The ''[[Jackanory]]'' episode "Inside Information" is aired on the [[BBC]].
* '''[[10 October|10]]''' - The ''[[Jackanory]]'' episode "Fire and Water" is aired on the [[BBC]].
* '''[[11 October|11]]''' - The ''[[Jackanory]]'' episode "The Clouds Burst" is aired on the [[BBC]].
* '''[[12 October|12]]''' - The ''[[Jackanory]]'' episode "The Last Stage" is aired on the [[BBC]].
* '''[[18 October|18]]''' - ''[[The Middle-earth Quiz Book]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - [[Amon Hen 41|''Amon Hen'' 41]] is published.

==November==
* '''[[1 November|1]]''' - ''[[Pictures by J.R.R. Tolkien]]'' is first published in the UK.
* '''[[19 November|19]]''' - ''[[Pictures by J.R.R. Tolkien]]'' is published in the US.

==December==
* '''?''' - [[Amon Hen 42|''Amon Hen'' 42]] is published,

* '''?''' - National Public Radio airs [[The Hobbit (1979 radio series)|''The Hobbit'' (1979 radio series)]]
* '''?''' - ''[[Tolkien's Art: A Mythology for England]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[A Hobbit's Journal]]'' is published.
